meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Harvey Barron Ann Wheeler Steve Brown Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #972.

td.p: Harvey Barron, a lawyer from Toronto, Canada
Ann Wheeler, a systems engineer from Oakland, California
Steve Brown, a chief petty officer from Twentynine Palms, California (whose 3-day cash winnings total $32,598)

tr.td: ADVERTISING
MUSEUMS
THE QUEEN'S ENGLISH
COUNTRY MUSIC
U.S. HISTORY
"T" TIME

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_2_4', 'clue_J_2_4_stuck', '(Harvey: Uh, what is the Museum of Natural History?)

(Harvey: Museum of Natural History.)
(Alex: Be more specific.)
(Harvey: Uh, the New York Museum of Natural History, Metropolitan Museum of Natural History?)
[Laughter]

American Museum of Natural History

SteveHarvey
')
